Text: Please seeders, confirm it is the real thing :)

I dunno, might be my computer but this runs really shitty. It stutters, have a lot of artefacts, subtitles drop in and out :/. 

I'm running it on a fairly old MacBook (Core 2 Duo with 1.83 Ghz and 2Gb memory) but normally it doesn't have any problems with 720p/files this size.
well the 1080 version this guy upped stutters and such, video freezes out periodically, and i have a decent video card and an i7, sooo
